name: Farkle Deluxe HD
description:
*** New Online Daily, Weekly, and Overall High Scores! ***

Farkle Deluxe is a new dice game for your iPad. Players take turns rolling six dice to get 1's, 5's, straights, or three of a kind. Players compete by choosing whether to bank their points or risk it by rolling again in this on the edge of your seat game. Score more points by risking it all, but careful! You could lose it all if you farkel. If you like Yahtzee™, Yacht, Craps, Poker Dice or Pig, you'll love Farkle Deluxe!

Challenge your friends and family or go head to head with up to 3 clever computer players. Farkle Deluxe also includes a solitaire mode where you can challenge your own personal best score or play against the world.


3D graphics, sound effects, and physics bring the dice rolling action to life. Customize your game by naming your human and computer players, choosing from 16 player images, and setting scoring variations and difficulty for every computer player.

Features:
  -Shake to roll ( Optional ) 
-Play versus the computer with up to 3 skilled AI opponents (To choose number of players, click on the red dice at top of new game screen 1,2,3, or 4 player games supported)
 -For faster game play, turn off dice rolling on Options Menu -Up to 4 human players 
-Customize player names and choose from 16 player images
 -4 Levels of computer difficulty 
-3D graphics and animation including dice rolling and marquee flashing
 -Optional scoring variations
 -Turn rolling on or off
 -How to Play and Tips 
-Sound Effects enhance gaming experience
-Turn History remembers every round of play for every player
-Online Daily, Weekly, and Global High Scores 
-Save your game where you left off 
-Statistics: keep track of your total wins and losses, current winning streak, and highest scores.


Yahtzee™ is a registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc.

Take a chance and win big with Farkle Deluxe!

  Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.
